name: JumpLife Demo
description:
JumpLife Demo

Jumplife is a minimalistic platformer. You play as a green square thing!

Since it is very early in development and this is the first game I'm developing, I don't know how everything will turn out just yet. 

Feedback is greatly appreciated!

Hope you enjoy it!

If you are interested in the game or it's development, here is my Twitter!

Controls

Keyboard: Arrowkeys and C.

Controller: Left Joystick and X(Playstation), A(XBox).
